name: 智保同行 (Smart Consular Protection)
description: An intelligent mobile-first web application providing global consular protection knowledge, emergency assistance, and risk assessment maps. Upgraded to 2025 web standards with React, Tailwind CSS, and PWA capabilities. Optimizations include: LCP reduction via critical CSS inlining (Tailwind), CLS minimization through fixed aspect ratios, FID improvement with efficient React hydration, and offline support via Service Worker caching.
